property.name: exec
property.value: ${PREFIX}${SVN_CMD} cp ${FORCE}${Q_MESSAGE}$[? MESSAGEFILE][-F ${MESSAGEFILE} ][]$[? REVISION][${REVISION} ][]${QUIET}${NONRECURSIVE}$[? TARGETS][--targets ${TARGETS} ][]${AUTH}${NOAUTHCACHE}${NONINTERACTIVE}$[? EDITORCMD][--editor-cmd ${EDITORCMD} ][]$[? ENCODING][--encoding ${ENCODING} ][]${QMPATHS} ${QUOTE}${DST}${QUOTE}${POSTFIX}

property.name: exec
property.value: ${PREFIX}${SVN_CMD} diff $[? OLDREVISION][-r ${OLDREVISION}:${NEWREVISION} ][]$[? EXTENSIONS][-x ${EXTENSIONS} ][]${NONRECURSIVE}$[? DIFFCMD][-x ${DIFFCMD} ][]${NODIFFDELETED}${IGNOREANCESTRY}${AUTH}${NOAUTHCACHE}${NONINTERACTIVE}$[? OLDTARGET][--old ${OLDTARGET}][${MPATHS_\/}]$[? NEWTARGET][--new ${QUOTE}${NEWTARGET}${QUOTE}][]${POSTFIX}
